page.title: 03 CHANGES IN EXNING IN 50 YRS
page.content: WORK:In those days the work in Exning was mainly farmwork or shop work,but there was also a cement works and a laundry firm.The crops grown then were the same types as nowadays,but the quality was much better,because natural fertilisers were used rather than chemicals. SHOPS:There were many more shops than there are in Exning now.Then they had shops like shoe repairers,blacksmiths, bike-menders,clothes shops and a bakery which still stands today. ENTERTAINMENT:50 years ago they had a snooker hall,bowling green and regular fairs and fetes.There was also an evening feast held once a year. GENERAL INFORMATION:Glanely Rest which is now the old peoples home was once called Harraton House.The bakery is the oldest building,still standing in Exning.It was built in 1908.
